definition: a collapsible shade for protection against weather consisting of fabric stretched over hinged ribs radiating from a central pole

something which covers or embraces a broad range of elements or factors                                      
             
             decided to expand … by building new colleges under a federation umbrella
the bell-shaped or saucer-shaped largely gelatinous structure that forms the chief part of the body of most jellyfishes : bell entry 1 sense 3b
something which provides protection: such as
defensive air cover (as over a battlefront)
a heavy barrage
to protect, cover, or provide with an umbrella
a device that is used for protection from the rain and sun
a group or organization that includes many smaller groups
something that includes several or many different things
a fabric covering stretched over a circular folding frame of rods attached to a pole and used as a protection against rain or sun

being or relating to a supplemental insurance policy that extends the coverage of an underlying policy on the same risk                                      
             
             an umbrella policy
in: decided to expand … by building new colleges under a federation umbrella

an umbrella policy
umbrella liability insurance

definition: an object that you hold over your head when it is raining
a similar but larger object that you use to protect yourself from the sun, for example on the beach or over a table
a parasol
a single large group that separate groups belong to or are protected by
something that gives protection

the UN aid umbrella

definition: a device for protection against the rain, consisting of a stick with a folding frame covered in material at one end and usually a handle at the other, or a similar, often larger, device used for protection against the sun:
something that includes or represents a group or range of similar things:
a cover that protects from rain or sun, esp. waterproof material fitted on a folding frame with a handle at one end:
An umbrella is also something that includes a number of similar things:
in: I felt a few drops of rain, so I put my umbrella up.
I left my umbrella on the bus yesterday.
a folding umbrella
